definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: First part, Reeducation through Labor Review and Development.
sentences.chinese: 勞動教養制度的回顧和發展。

sentences.english: To abolish the reeducation-through-labor system becomes an inevitable tendency.
sentences.chinese: 廢除勞動教養制度，成爲一種必然的趨勢。

sentences.english: First chapter elaborated education-through-labor historical vicissitude and the development tendency.
sentences.chinese: 第一章論述了勞動教養的歷史變遷與發展趨勢。

sentences.english: Not re-teaching staff of socialization is the core of the work of reeducation through labor.
sentences.chinese: 對未教人員的再社會化是勞動教養工作的核心內容。

sentences.english: In the third part , the author makes relative study on the resemble systems of the West.
sentences.chinese: 第三章勞動教養國外相關制度的比較研究。
